text: @replouiegohmert @seanhannity Knucklehead Galore aka @replouiegohmert thinks he got Covid-19 from a mask. Nope. You got it from lack of a brain, idiot. You're a disgrace to the country and Congress. Go knock on your desk now. You won't be in any more hearings. Buh-bye!
